name: Autorennen
overview: An auto racing game by Stefan Redinger and published in early November of 1983 in Homecomputer 1983/11. Car racing has always been one of the most popular computer games. This game is undoubtedly a good bit of fun. Thanks to the well-known 3D effect gives you the impression of driving on the screen. You have to be careful on the winding road and get your timing correct as you corner at the ever increasing speed, as you might crash with other cars.
